mapper.select: SELECT group_name as groupName FORM group_create WHERE group_no = ${groupNo}

SELECT a.group_name as groupName, a.member_no as memberNo, b.health_survey_result_no as healthSurveyResultNo, b.health_survey_evaluation_do as healthSurveyEvaluationDo, b.health_survey_result_date as healthSurveyResultDate, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memeberId FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN health_survey_result b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_name = #{groupName} AND a.personal_information_approval = 'T' ORDER BY health_survey_result_date DESC LIMIT 0, 3

SELECT a.group_name as groupName, a.member_no as memberNo, b.health_screen_no as healthScreenNo, b.health_screen_date as healthScreenDate, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memeberId FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN health_screen b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_name = #{groupName} AND a.personal_information_approval = 'T' ORDER BY health_screen_date DESC LIMIT 0, 3

SELECT
a.group_name as groupName, b.medication_no as medicationNo, b.medication_start_date as medicationStartDate, b.medication_end_date as medicationEndDate, b.dosage as dosage, b.medication_title as medicationTitle, a.member_no as memberNo, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memeberId FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN medication b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_name = #{groupName} AND a.personal_information_approval = 'T' ORDER BY medication_date DESC LIMIT 0, 3

SELECT a.group_name as groupName, a.member_no as memberNo, b.treatment_no as treatmentNo, b.treatment_department as treatmentDepartment, b.hospital_name as hospitalName, b.treatment_title as treatmentTitle, b.treatment_content as treatmentContent, b.doctor_name as doctorName, b.hospital_address as hospitalAddress, b.treatment_date as tratmentDate, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memeberId FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN treatment b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_name = #{groupName} AND a.personal_information_approval = 'T' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC LIMIT 0, 3
SELECT a.group_no as groupNo, a.group_info as groupInfo FROM group_create a INNER JOIN group_invite_approval_result b ON a.group_name = b.group_name WHERE a.group_name = #{groupName} LIMIT 0,1
SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite_approval_result WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
SELECT group_name as groupName FROM group_invite_approval_result WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT a.group_name as groupName, a.member_no as memberNo, b.health_survey_result_no as healthSurveyResultNo, b.health_survey_evaluation_do as healthSurveyEvaluationDo, b.health_survey_result_date as healthSurveyResultDate, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memeberId FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN health_survey_result b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_name = #{groupName} AND a.personal_information_approval = 'T'

SELECT a.group_name as groupName, a.member_no as memberNo, b.health_screen_no as healthScreenNo, b.health_screen_date as healthScreenDate, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memeberId FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN health_screen b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_name = #{groupName} AND a.personal_information_approval = 'T'

SELECT a.group_name as groupName, a.member_no as memberNo, b.treatment_no as treatmentNo, b.treatment_department as treatmentDepartment, b.hospital_name as hospitalName, b.treatment_title as treatmentTitle, b.treatment_content as treatmentContent, b.doctor_name as doctorName, b.hospital_address as hospitalAddress, b.treatment_date as tratmentDate, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memeberId FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN treatment b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_name = #{groupName} AND a.personal_information_approval = 'T'

SELECT
a.group_name as groupName, b.medication_no as medicationNo, b.medication_start_date as medicationStartDate, b.medication_end_date as medicationEndDate, b.dosage as dosage, b.medication_title as medicationTitle, a.member_no as memberNo, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memeberId FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN medication b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_name = #{groupName} AND a.personal_information_approval = 'T'
SELECT b.member_name as memberName, b.member_no as memberNo FROM group_create a INNER JOIN member b ON a.member_no = b.member_no WHERE group_name = #{groupName}

SELECT b.member_no as memberNo, b.member_name as memberName, b.member_id as memberId FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN member b ON a.member_no = b.member_no WHERE group_name = #{groupName} ORDER BY group_invite_approval_date ASC

SELECT a.member_no as memberNo, c.group_name as groupName, c.group_no as groupNo, b.member_name as memberName FROM group_invite a INNER JOIN member b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN group_create c ON a.group_no = c.group_no WHERE group_name = #{groupName}
SELECT member_no as memberNo FROM group_invite_approval_result WHERE group_name = #{groupName}

SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite_approval_result WHERE group_name = #{groupName}
AND a.group_invite_no like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND b.member_id like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND b.member_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND a.personal_information_approval like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite_approval_result WHERE group_name = #{groupName} AND group_invite_approval_date >= #{startDate} AND #{endDate} > a.group_invite_approval_date

SELECT a.group_invite_no as groupInviteNo, a.group_name as groupName, a.personal_information_approval as personalInformationApproval, a.group_invite_approval_date as groupInviteApprovalDate, b.member_name as memberName, b.member_id as memberId, c.group_no as groupNo FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN member b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN group_invite c ON a.group_invite_no = c.group_invite_no WHERE c.group_name = #{groupName} AND a.group_invite_approval_date >= #{startDate} AND #{endDate} > a.group_invite_approval_date ORDER BY a.group_invite_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}
SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite_approval_result WHERE group_name = #{groupName}

SELECT a.group_invite_no as groupInviteNo, a.group_name as groupName, a.personal_information_approval as personalInformationApproval, a.group_invite_approval_date as groupInviteApprovalDate, b.member_name as memberName, b.member_id as memberId, c.group_no as groupNo FROM group_invite_approval_result a INNER JOIN member b ON a.member_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN group_invite c ON a.group_invite_no = c.group_invite_no WHERE c.group_name = #{groupName} ORDER BY a.group_invite_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}
SELECT max(CAST(substring(group_invite_no,14) AS DECIMAL)) FROM group_invite
SELECT member_name as memberName, member_no as memberNo, member_agree as memberAgree FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_agree as personalInformationApproval FROM member WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite

SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite a INNER JOIN group_create b ON a.group_no = b.group_no INNER JOIN group_kind c ON b.group_kind_no = c.group_kind_no
WHERE a.member_no = #{memberNo}
AND b.group_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND c.group_kind_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND b.group_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND c.group_kind_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')

SELECT a.group_invite_no as groupInviteNo, a.group_no as groupNo, a.member_no as memberNo, a.group_invite_date as groupInviteDate, a.group_invite_message as groupInviteMessage, b.group_name as groupName, b.group_Info as groupInfo, c.group_kind_name as groupKindName FROM group_invite a INNER JOIN group_create b ON a.group_no = b.group_no INNER JOIN group_kind c ON b.group_kind_no = c.group_kind_no
WHERE a.member_no = #{memberNo}
AND b.group_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND c.group_kind_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND b.group_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND c.group_kind_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
ORDER BY group_invite_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}

SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite a INNER JOIN group_create b ON a.group_no = b.group_no INNER JOIN group_kind c ON b.group_kind_no = c.group_kind_no
WHERE a.member_no = #{memberNo} group_invite_date >= #{startDate} AND #{endDate} > group_invite_date
group_invite_date >= #{startDate} AND #{endDate} > group_invite_date

SELECT a.group_invite_no as groupInviteNo, a.group_no as groupNo, a.member_no as memberNo, a.group_invite_date as groupInviteDate, a.group_invite_message as groupInviteMessage, b.group_name as groupName, b.group_Info as groupInfo, c.group_kind_name as groupKindName FROM group_invite a INNER JOIN group_create b ON a.group_no = b.group_no INNER JOIN group_kind c ON b.group_kind_no = c.group_kind_no
WHERE a.member_no = #{memberNo} group_invite_date >= #{startDate} AND #{endDate} > group_invite_date
group_invite_date >= #{startDate} AND #{endDate} > group_invite_date
ORDER BY group_invite_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}

SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite a INNER JOIN group_create b ON a.group_no = b.group_no INNER JOIN group_kind c ON b.group_kind_no = c.group_kind_no
WHERE a.member_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite WHERE group_no = ${groupNo}
AND a.group_invite_no like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') OR c.member_id like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') OR a.group_invite_approval like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') OR c.member_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND c.member_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND a.group_invite_no like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND c.member_id like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND a.group_invite_approval like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')

SELECT b.group_name as groupName, c.member_no as memberNo, a.group_invite_no as groupInviteNo, a.group_no as groupNo, a.group_invite_approval as groupInviteApproval, a.group_invite_date as groupInviteDate, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memberId FROM group_invite a INNER JOIN group_create b ON a.group_no = b.group_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_no = ${groupNo}
AND a.group_invite_no like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') OR c.member_id like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') OR a.group_invite_approval like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') OR c.member_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND c.member_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND a.group_invite_no like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND c.member_id like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND a.group_invite_approval like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
ORDER BY group_invite_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}
SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite WHERE a.group_no = ${groupNo} AND group_invite_date >= #{startDate} AND #{endDate} > group_invite_date

SELECT b.group_name as groupName, c.member_no as memberNo, a.group_invite_no as groupInviteNo, a.group_no as groupNo, a.group_invite_approval as groupInviteApproval, a.group_invite_date as groupInviteDate, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memberId FROM group_invite a INNER JOIN group_create b ON a.group_no = b.group_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_no = ${groupNo} AND group_invite_date >= #{startDate} AND #{endDate} > group_invite_date ORDER BY group_invite_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}
SELECT count(*) FROM group_invite WHERE group_no = ${groupNo}

SELECT a.group_invite_no as groupInviteNo, a.group_no as groupNo, a.group_invite_approval as groupInviteApproval, a.group_invite_date as groupInviteDate, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_no as memberNo, c.member_id as memberId FROM group_invite a INNER JOIN group_create b ON a.group_no = b.group_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.member_no = c.member_no WHERE a.group_no = ${groupNo} ORDER BY group_invite_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}
